titles: An ansvver to a pamphlet intituled the Lord George Digby his apologie for himselfe; plainly discovering the cunning untruths, and implicit malice in the said pamphlet against the just and legall proceedings of the Honourable the High Court of Parliament.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Bristol, George Digby, --  Earl of, 1612-1677. --  Lord George Digbie's apologie for himselfe --  Early works to 1800.
